entry.title: Saturday: Cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning this evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 40%
